Food.title: The Burg
Food.detail: The Burg is a great place to get a yummy classic cheeseburger and delicious thick milkshakes. Everyone can enjoy a burger from The Burg.

Food.title: Gator Jacks
Food.detail: Enjoy a fresh sandwich from Gator Jacks. It's a make your own sandwich place and you can get a chance to try some alligator bites.

Food.title: Taqueria El Rancho
Food.detail: Get a taste of authentic mexican food. Experience eating it in a bus. Try their horchata its the best.

Indoor.title: Fat Cats
Indoor.detail: Fat Cats has bowling, Movies, Mini Golf, Archade Games and more. If you want to do something fun and it's too cold outside come to Fat Cats.

Indoor.title: Rexburg Tabernacle
Indoor.detail: Check out one of the older buildings in Rexburg. Take a look at the past as you enter this historic building.

Indoor.title: Regional Rock Walls
Indoor.detail: Need a place to climb and learn a new skill. Come to Regional Rock Walls to have a fun rock climbing experience.

Indoor.title: Legacy Flight Museum
Indoor.detail: Take a step back into the aerial past. The local museum located at the airport in Rexburg helps you see planes from the past.

Indoor.title: Craze
Indoor.detail: Grab your friends and have fun at Craze. This is a the place to play fun archade games and battle in a game of laser tag.

Indoor.title: The Escape House
Indoor.detail: If you life puzzles and a challenging one come to the escape house and solve mysteries and puzzles to get your self out of the rooms.

Outdoor.title: Darby Wind Caves
Outdoor.detail: Take this hike during the fall. The trees are beautiful and many different colors. Take a flash light with you so you can explore the cave.

Outdoor.title: Porter Park
Outdoor.detail: Just one of the parks in Rexburg. This has great space to play group games along with a couple of tennis courts. Enjoy park carousel.

Outdoor.title: Goldbug Hot Springs
Outdoor.address: Salmon - Challis National Forest, Salmon, ID 83467
Outdoor.detail: Its a little of a drive, but these hot springs will be a desination you will remember. Take the hike up to these natural hot tubs and relax with a view.

Outdoor.title: Kelly Canyon Ski Resort
Outdoor.detail: Want somethig fun to do in the snow? Grab your snow gear and take a trip to Kelly Canyon Ski Resort. They have night skiing available for those that don't want to spend as much money on lift tickets.

Outdoor.title: Packsaddle Lake
Outdoor.detail: It may be a steep little hike, but lake is worth it. Only about a half hour from Rexburg you can experience beautiful nature.
